title: Martinez Cocktail
full_text:
Martinez Cocktail
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
3 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
Old Tom gin
1 1/2
ounces
sweet vermouth
(I like Carpano Antica in this)
1
teaspoon
maraschino liqueur
2
dashes
orange bitters
Lemon twist
, for garnish
Directions
Fill a mixing glass with ice. Add gin, sweet vermouth, maraschino liqueur, and orange bitters. Stir until very cold then strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist lemon peel over cocktail to express its oils. Rub rim of glass with peel and discard.
Special Equipment
Mixing glass,
cocktail strainer
Gin
